Desc.entry: Works with young people aged 10-17 years who have severe weight problems, low self-esteem, anxiety or depression and suffer from bullying. Free courses involve looking at healthy eating, exercise, cooking, camping and outdoor pursuits. Limited places. Also has a mobile double decker health bus that promotes healthy lifestyles in the community. Can be hired for fayres and events by schools and other organisations. Equipped with a nutrition centre and a multi purpose gym upstairs with Nintendo Wii sports. Also provides a drop in centre offering free guidance and support and specialist courses for BME communities, with single sex classes, please contact for further details. Therapists available. Company limited by guarantee 6506027.
